title: Pedagogical Competency Enhancement: Simulation-Based Flexible Learning Path Design for Mathematical Sequencing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (secondary education level)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems with 80% accuracy through SCORM/workflow-based content sequencing in a simulated environment.
Learners can design VR-based self-directed learning pathways, create individual learning plans, and achieve over 90% satisfaction.
Learners can demonstrate mathematical problem-solving strategies applicable to real-world job scenarios at least three times through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
